summary: Hilights a pair of parens/braces that surround the cursor
name: surrparen
description:
The surrparen plugin hilights a pair of parens/braces that surround
the cursor position automatically. Unlike the matchparen.vim, it works 
even when the cursor is not just on a paren/brace.
It's useful especially for texts that have many parens like lisp source.
install_details: Just put it in your .vim/plugin directory.
